title: plotme地皮插件怎么设置地皮价格
author: 卡经济
txt_content: plotme地皮插件怎么设置地皮价格，因为我看见有的服务器可以设置地皮价格，所以那位大神教教我{:10_492:}

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
economy:
      UseEconomy: false          <<<<这里改成 true
      CanPutOnSale: false
      CanSellToBank: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 0.0       <<<<这里输入地皮价格
      ClearPrice: 0.0
      AddPlayerPrice: 0.0
      DenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      RemovePlayerPrice: 0.0
      UndenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      PlotHomePrice: 0.0
      CanCustomizeSellPrice: false
      SellToPlayerPrice: 0.0
      SellToBankPrice: 0.0
      BuyFromBankPrice: 0.0
      AddCommentPrice: 0.0
      BiomeChangePrice: 0.0
      ProtectPrice: 0.0
      DisposePrice: 0.0
usemySQL: false
mySQLconn: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/minecraft
mySQLuname: root
mySQLpass: password
globalUseEconomy: false    <<<<这里设置 true
AdvancedLogging: false
Language: english
allowWorldTeleport: true
defaultWEAnywhere: false
auto-update: false
allowToDeny: true
复制代码

replies.author: 卡经济
replies.txt_content:
灬友情灬 发表于 2015-8-2 21:01
